channel.title: Duradel [PI] Slayer
channel.description: okay so my duradel can give me a task and everything works but when i try to go to the shop it won't let me, i try to trade him and nothing comes up. but i know i have the shop and everything. but how do i know if its correct?

item.title: Duradel [PI] Slayer

mhm

case 8275: c.getShops().openShop(48); c.sendMessage("You currently got <col=255>"+c.magePoints+"</col> Slayer Points");[/quote]
woot woot shit worked thanks dude how do i change the prices inside the shop though? theyre slay points so i’m not sure…

item.description:
@owner_sam111 wrote:

maybe you need to add it go to shop.cfg make a shop than in the begin of shop cfg you see shop(id) that remind that id
-------------------------npc id and openshop is what you did with shop.cfg
case 242:
c.getShops().openShop(38);
break;

item.title: Duradel [PI] Slayer
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Find the npc_id and look for the case. it would be like

case NPC_ID: c.getShop().openShop(SHOP_ID);
then find that Shop id and see if theirs anything added in shops.cfg with that id.

Read full topic
